modName: Leah The Ebony Warrior Follower By KZ90
summary: Leah the ebony warrior follower is a follower that has a full set of ebony armor (no helmet) that will follow you wherever you go. With a blue flamed aura around her body.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][b]Leah the ebony warrior follower is a follower that has a full set of ebony armour (no helmet) that will follow you wherever you go. With a blue flamed aura around her body.
